text: Kosmas Gezos (; born 15 August 1992) is a Greek professional footballer who plays as a centre-back for Austrian club Austria Klagenfurt.Soccerway profile ==Personal life== Gezos' younger brother, Polydoros, is also a professional footballer. ==References== Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:People from Athens Category:Greek footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Super League Greece players Category:Panionios F.C. players Category:Acharnaikos F.C. players Category:Akropolis IF players Category:Greek expatriate footballers Category:Greek expatriate sportspeople in Sweden Category:Expatriate footballers in Sweden Category:A.O. Glyfada players
title: Kosmas Gezos
